entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
